mapper.select: select U.*, CH.parishName, CH.churchName userChurchName from TO_USER U left outer join TO_CHURCH CH on CH.id = U.churchId where U.id = #{id}
select U.*, CH.parishName, CH.churchName userChurchName from TO_USER U left outer join TO_CHURCH CH on CH.id = U.churchId where U.userLoginId = #{userLoginId}
select * from TO_USER_TOKEN where token = #{token} and expiredDate > current_timestamp
mapper.insert: insert into TO_USER_TOKEN ( userId, token, expiredDate ) values ( #{userId}, #{token}, #{expiredDate} )
mapper.update: update TO_USER_TOKEN set expiredDate = sysdate() where token = #{token} and expiredDate > sysdate()

select U.*, CH.parishName, CH.churchName userChurchName , case when userStatus = 'NEW' then '대기' when userStatus = 'CONFIRMED' then '승인' when userStatus = 'REJECT' then '승인거절' end userStatusName from TO_USER U join TO_CHURCH CH on CH.id = U.churchId join TO_USER_MANAGE_CHURCH UMC on UMC.churchId = U.churchId join TO_USER_AUTHORITY UA on UA.userId = UMC.userId and UA.authorityName = 'ROLE_MANAGER' where U.userStatus in ( 'NEW', 'CONFIRMED', 'REJECT' ) and UMC.userId = #{managerUserId}
and U.userLoginId like CONCAT('%',#{keywordText},'%')
and ( U.userName like CONCAT('%',#{keywordText},'%') or U.proviName like CONCAT('%',#{keywordText},'%') )
order by U.id desc
